note.p: Surgeon and asylum proprietor. LRCS Edinburgh, 1838. Resident assistant surgeon, Bethnal House, 1843–52. Superintendent, Buckinghamshire County Pauper Lunatic Asylum, 1853–6. LRCP Edinburgh, 1859. Medical superintendent, Bethnal House, 1859–88.
Crammer 1990, Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/423/124/1).
